title: DC Bias Unit
subtitle: 2 models: 3265B (25A) and 3265BQ (25A)

paragraphs: The 3265B DC Bias Units are designed to work seamlessly with Wayne Kerr's Inductance Analyzers (3255B series) and the 3260B Precision Magnetics Analyzer. These units enable precise evaluation of components under high DC bias currents up to 250A, making them indispensable for testing wound devices and inductors under real-world application conditions.

applications: Component tests in research, development, and production environments
Evaluating the performance of wound components and SMD inductors
AC parameter and DC resistance measurements
Enhancing the testing capabilities of Wayne Kerr Machines

features.title: High DC Bias Capability
features.description: Offers DC bias currents from 25 mA to 25A in steps of 25 mA with a single unit, and up to 250A with five units connected in parallel

features.title: Versatility
features.description: Compatible with the 3255BL for currents up to 50A, and the 3260B Analyzer for comprehensive SMD inductor tests up to 50A with the optional 1009 DC Bias Fixture

features.title: Safety and Protection
features.description: Features a safety interlock system, alongside protection against over-temperature, excess voltage drop, and sense lead failure, ensuring user safety and equipment reliability

features.title: Precision Testing
features.description: Supports a wide frequency range from 20 Hz to 3MHz, with a basic accuracy of 0.1%, for measurement functions including L, R, D, Q, Z

features.title: Compliance Voltage
features.description: Provides up to 11 V DC compliance voltage to accommodate a wide range of test conditions

features.title: Ease of Use
features.description: Includes four front panel mounted BNC connectors and two captive high current cables for straightforward setup and operation

features.title: Flexible Configuration
features.description: Allows for both 4 and 2 terminal measurements, with the option to connect up to 5 bias units in parallel for increased output current

features.title: Customizable Testing
features.description: Interchangeable component test carriers and a carrier design and manufacturing service offer flexibility for device-specific testing

specifications.heading: Measurement Function
content: In impedance mode: L, Z, R, Q, D
Not applicable to Rdc, or transformer measurements

specifications.heading: Frequency Range
content: 3255BL 20 Hz to 200 kHz (not compatible with 3265B/25A and 3265BQ/25A)

specifications.heading: Compliance Voltage
content: Maximum compliance voltage is 11 V DC with a 0.25 V AC drive under 12 kHz, and 10 V at a 1 V AC drive level

specifications.heading: Basic Accuracy
content: Â±1% variance, dependent on measurement speed, frequency, and selected options

specifications.heading: Input Specification
content: Universal 90 to 255 V AC, 47 to 63 Hz
Unit powers up automatically when connected to a powered analyzer. Isolating switch provided

specifications.heading: Measurement Connections
content: 4-terminal measurement via Kelvin leads and M8 studs
Measurement terminals internally protected by 1.6A fuses against normal inductor back-EMF or accidental disconnection of inductor
